snippet: Plenette Pierson scored 9 of her 22 points in the fourth quarter as the host Liberty recovered after giving up nearly all of a 19-point lead in the third quarter and beat the Seattle Storm.
abstract: New York Liberty defeat Seattle Storm, 66-57; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Plenette Pierson scored 9 of her 22 points in the fourth quarter as the host Liberty recovered after giving up nearly all of a 19-point lead in the third quarter and beat the Seattle Storm.

headline.main: Pierson Helps Liberty End Three-Game Skid
headline.print_headline: Pierson Helps Liberty End Three-Game Skid
